metadata.title: CVE-2017-7551 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
389-ds-base version before 1.3.5.19 and 1.3.6.7 are vulnerable to passwordbrute-force attacks during account lockout due to different return codesreturned on password attempts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
python3-dirsrvtests - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
python3-lib389 - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1').
